name: Cutie Collect
description:
In CUTIE COLLECT, a game with a new and innovative concept, you combine same colored CUTIE CHIPS in levels of ever-increasing difficulty.

Detailed graphics, realistic game physics and a well thought-out single-finger control make for fun from the very first minute.

Play solo and collect all 100 cuties in CUTIE COLLECTs integrated photo album, or compete against your friends in the Game Center and get the highest score.

CUTIE COLLECT is available exclusively on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch.

Game features:

• New, innovative game concept

• Unlock up to 100 wonderfully drawn CUTIES

• Integrated photo album for your cuties

• Cinematic effects and high-resolution 3D graphics

• Ultimate CUTIE COLLECTOR - Game Center - Leaderboard

• Listen to your favorite music while you play
